Sentencas: For solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) energy systems, the development of an appropriate thermal management is a fundamental issue.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation

Sentencas: Specifically SOFC, during load following operation, could face thermal stresses that can lead to performance degradation and to a consequently strong reduction of their lifetime.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation

Sentencas: In this research work, SOFC dynamic model, based on electrochemical reaction and enthalpy balance equations, was developed.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation

Sentencas: The modelling activity and the consequent model validation were carried out basing on experimental data obtained from a test campaign on a short stack.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation

Sentencas: The implemented tool permits, in load following operation, to regulate SOFC temperature at a fixed value, adjusting instantaneously the cathodic air flow rate varying the air utilizition factor (U-ox).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation

Sentencas: At the same time, the model allows the evaluation of the transient behaviour of the main system parameters as: equivalent hydrogen flow rate, current and operating voltage.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell modelling: Electrochemical performance and thermal management during load-following operation
